channel.title: Coke Music Filters - Working With WPE
channel.description:
[center]WPE = Windows Packet Editor[/center]
The tutorial isnt complete as I ran into computer problems when I was nearing the end, so it may be completed sometime in the future, but really, if you can understand until the end, then you should have an excellent idea on where to go from there.
*Cant upload on here, too big*
DL Link - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=04BPCOFF

item.title: Coke Music Filters - Working With WPE

it is client side but theres little "loop holes" that effect real gameplay. im 99% sure on that, but if someone dissagrees then please post!

item.title: Coke Music Filters - Working With WPE
item.dc:creator: @Uxalis Uxalis
item.description:
@Uxalis wrote:

Home:

WPE PRO have always Trojan in it… But it is good one… not shit one

Not always, most of the time an antivirus detects it as a virus due to the fact that it’s a packet editor.

oi:

I’m sure when you use stuff like wpe most of the results are client side.

Not with cokemusic, try it, i used to do this thing ages ago, had loads of rare furniture and became very rich :D.

Read full topic

item.title: Coke Music Filters - Working With WPE
item.dc:creator: @bumr055 bumr055
item.description:
@bumr055 wrote:

pimp pimp, the dll aslways shows up as a virus an deletes it i get pissed. you should upload some new filters.

all the stuff is client side but you can use it to your advantage and change real stuff in the game if you know what your doing. like changing the hightmap made you be able to put stuff in the wall.

edit: i remember when cokemusic used to be good, then they tryd to make it unhackable by dubbuling up the hex and now its lagy as shit.

edit2:i just logged on it and my guy is uber haxed he has random colours and stuff i ferget how i did that.

Read full topic
